tool_description: Get meanings and synonyms for words in vernacular language

api_list.name: Synonym
api_list.description: Retrieve synonyms of a specified word in a given language.

required_parameters.name: language
required_parameters.description: The language of the word for which synonyms are requested.

required_parameters.name: word
required_parameters.description: The word for which synonyms are to be found.

api_list.name: Meanings
api_list.description: Retrieve the meaning of a specified word in a given language.

required_parameters.name: language
required_parameters.description: The language of the word for which the meaning is requested.

required_parameters.name: word
required_parameters.description: The word for which the meaning is to be found.
